transArray.content: The room was very clean and the location was convenient

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. This location provides guests with great convenience in terms of food, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. Moreover, the hotel's enthusiastic staff will escort you during your trip. The hotel The products and services provided are of reliable quality. We have always put hygiene first. Providing guests with peace of mind and a comfortable stay is our continuous goal. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay. Thanks! General Manager: Li Changxia
